languages.text: {n}Едва держась на ногах, Хейнрикс делает шаг и слепо протягивает к вам дрожащую от усилия руку. Наткнувшись на ваше плечо, он скользит ладонью вверх, по вашей шее и щеке, его касание едва ощутимо.{/n} "{name}..." {n}Вздрогнув и запнувшись, он убирает руку и отступает назад.{/n}

{n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едва держась на ногах, Хейнрикс делает шаг и слепо протягивает к вам дрожащую от усилия руку. Наткнувшись на ваше плечо, он скользит ладонью вверх, по вашей шее и щеке, его касание едва ощутимо.{/n} "{name}..." {n}Вздрогнув и запнувшись, он убирает руку и отступает назад.{/n}

{n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは不安定な足取りで一歩を踏み出し、震えた腕を伸ばす。彼の手はあなたの肩に触れ、軽く首筋に、そして頬を滑らせる。{/n}「{name}…」{n}彼はためらい、手を引っ込め、後ずさりした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは不安定な足取りで一歩を踏み出し、震えた手を伸ばす。彼の手はあなたの肩に触れ、軽く首筋に、そして頬を滑らせる。{/n}「{name}…」{n}彼はためらい、手を引っ込め、後ずさりした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希摇摇晃晃迈出一步，努力伸出不住颤抖的胳膊。他的手摸到你的肩膀，随后轻轻地滑到你的脖子，又滑到你的脸颊。{/n}“{name}……”{n}他迟疑片刻，缩回了手，退了一步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希摇摇晃晃迈出一步，努力伸出不住颤抖的手。他的手摸到你的肩膀，随后轻轻地滑到你的脖子，又滑到你的脸颊。{/n}“{name}……”{n}他迟疑片刻，缩回了手，退了一步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix da un paso tambaleante y estira el brazo, que empieza a temblar por el esfuerzo. Su mano encuentra tu hombro, se desliza ligeramente por tu cuello y llega hasta tu mejilla.{/n} «{name}...». {n}Vacila, retira la mano y retrocede.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix da un paso tambaleante y estira la mano, que empieza a temblar por el esfuerzo. Su mano encuentra tu hombro, se desliza ligeramente por tu cuello y llega hasta tu mejilla.{/n} «{name}...». {n}Vacila, retira la mano y retrocede.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix macht auf unsicheren Beinen ein paar Schritte und streckt den Arm aus, der vor Anstrengung zu zittern beginnt. Seine Hand findet deine Schulter, gleitet leicht zu deinem Hals hinauf, dann zu deiner Wange.{/n} "{name} ..." {n}Er stockt, zieht seine Hand zurück und tritt wieder nach hinten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix macht auf wackligen Beinen ein paar Schritte und streckt die Hand aus, die vor Anstrengung zu zittern beginnt. Seine Hand findet deine Schulter, gleitet leicht zu deinem Hals hinauf, dann zu deiner Wange.{/n} "{name} ..." {n}Er stockt, zieht seine Hand zurück und tritt wieder nach hinten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur fait un pas chancelant en avant et tend un bras. Tremblant sous l'effort, il parvient néanmoins à atteindre votre épaule, puis fait lentement glisser sa main le long de votre cou jusqu'à caresser votre joue.{/n} « {name}... » {n}Il vacille, retire sa main et fait quelques pas en arrière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur fait un pas chancelant en avant et tend le bras. Tremblant sous l'effort, il parvient néanmoins à atteindre votre épaule, puis fait lentement glisser sa main le long de votre cou jusqu'à caresser votre joue.{/n} « {name}... » {n}Il vacille, retire sa main et fait quelques pas en arrière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, titrek ayaklarıyla adım atıp kolunu esnetirken kendini zorladığı için titriyor. Eliyle omzunu buluyor, hafifçe önce boynuna, ardından da yanağına uzanıyor.{/n} "{name}..." {n}Yalpalayarak elini çekip geri adım atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step on unsteady feet and stretches out his arm, which begins to tremble from the exertion. His hand finds your shoulder, lightly slides up to your neck, then to your cheek.{/n} "{name}..." {n}He falters, retracts his hand, and steps back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, titrek ayaklarıyla adım atıp kolunu esnetirken kendini zorladığı için titriyor. Eliyle omzunu buluyor, hafifçe önce boynuna, ardından da yanağına uzanıyor.{/n} "{name}..." {n}Yalpalayarak elini çekip geri adım atıyor.{/n}
